name: Blocktopia
description:
Blocktopia
Blocktopia is a sandbox RPG that explores a cute block world designed with fresh colors.
Islands of various environments with their own personalities are prepared, and users can enjoy various contents such as gathering, farming, herding, hunting, construction, and crafting by utilizing the resources of each island.
In addition, with the powerful customizing function, you can design everything you see, such as characters, buildings, and decorations, and there is also a social network function that allows you to share your designs with other users.

- RPG: Collection and growth of various and unique characters. Fierce battles with monsters crossing reality and fantasy. RPG elements are one axis that makes up Blocktopia.

-SANDBOX: Combining items acquired through gathering and hunting to create various equipment and structures, as well as a powerful customizing function, the Sandbox element is another axis of Blocktopia.

- SNG: Content created with the customizing tool can be shared and traded through social networks. In addition, various types of SNG elements such as visiting friends or strangers' islands are prepared as the last axis to complete Blocktopia.
